title: ANDaruL puriya
sahitya:
ANDaruL puriya vENDumaiyE ennai pANDit=ten pazhani ANDavanE nI


anupallavi

  vENDum varam peTru vishanamaTru vAzha tUNDu mAvalODunnai vENDi vaNanguginrEn


caraNam    poi shUdu vAdil manam pOgha viDAmal uiydu pizhaikka vaghai sheyya vENumayyE
vaiyaghattOrkk-aruLai vAri vazhangiDavE vaiyApuri tigazhum vaDivEl ayyanE
